Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Creatures in the Dark Cathedral pose a threat to our reaching those we need to attack.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:25#1081#remorseless hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:25#1041#dread squires}, {@LinkCreature:25#1021#devan prelates}, {@LinkCreature:25#1022#skeletal wardens}, {@LinkCreature:25#1031#dread knights}, {@LinkCreature:25#1032#skeletal defenders}, and {@LinkCreature:25#1051#skeletal pikemen}.

Report to Coordinator Delwen when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
